Description.0: The Deucalion class is thin for its configeration with most of the ships width coming from its large wings.
Description.1: Normaly these ships use their eight medium grav drives, mounted along the wings, to propel the ship.
Description.2: The ships heavy grav drives are mounted in sets of three on back of the main hull.
Description.3: This placment gives the ship a massave aft section making the ship seem sumwhat unbalanced.
Description.4: These heavy engines are used to provide the ship with a massive increase to its linnier speed for periods of time as well as increase its mauverablity in open combat.
